resources.string: If selected, the list will be sorted with reverse order
Personal data is incredible and close to god

Нижегородское областное училище олимпийского резерва им. В.С. Тишина. Колледж физической культуры и спорта, экономики и технологии Санкт-Петербургского государственного университета. Приморское государственное училище (техникум) олимпийского резерва (г. Владивосток). Колледж физической культуры и спорта "Спарта" (г. Москва). Московское среднее специальное училище олимпийского резерва №4 им. А.Я. Гомельского (техникум) Департамента спорта и туризма г. Москвы.
1.Pull-ups on the bar \n Basic functional exercise for developing the muscles of the back, shoulder girdle and arms. \n 3-4 sets of 8-10 reps
2.Exercise "Bicycle" \n One of the best exercises for strengthening core and abdominal muscles. \n 3-4 sets of 10-15 reps

1.Elbow plank 
 A sophisticated variation of the classic plank exercise. 
 Helps to improve posture, strengthen abs and develop the shoulder girdle. 
 3 sets of 45-60 seconds

4.Side bar
 Exercise for the development of oblique abdominal muscles. 
 Try to keep your abdominal muscles tense while doing it.
 3 sets of 45-60 seconds
1.Pushups\n A key exercise for developing the pectoral muscles. At the top, push off the floor as hard as possible, opening your back.\n 3-4 sets of 10-12 reps
3.Reverse push-ups\n Exercise to strengthen the muscles of the triceps, forearms and shoulder girdle. At the top point, as if pushing your body weight up.\n 3-4 sets of 10-15 reps
2.Lunges on one leg\n Exercise for the muscles of the front of the thigh and for the buttocks. As you exhale, lower yourself down, keeping the body upright and the abs tense.\n 3-4 sets of 10-15 reps

3.Bodyweight squats\n A key exercise for developing leg muscles. As you lower yourself down, feel the tension of the abdominal muscles. Rise up as you inhale, opening your chest.\n 3-4 sets of 10-12 reps
2.Lying Leg Raise\n Exercise for the lower press. It is performed without lifting the lower back from the floor and with a constant feeling of the press.\n 3-4 sets of 10-12 reps
5.Lying Hip Raise\n Exercise to develop the lower press and strengthen the buttocks. As you exhale, lift your hips up, then linger at the top point.\n 3 sets of 45-60 seconds
